evidence.claim: FinPay utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless architecture to manage healthcare transactions efficiently.
The company is committed to HIPAA compliance ensuring that all health data transactions are secure and confidential.
FinPay uses FHIR standards for health information exchange, promoting interoperability between healthcare systems.
Integration with X12 EDI transaction sets is supported for processing healthcare claims and billing.
FinPay's architecture supports microservices to enhance the delivery of its healthcare financial services.

icp.icp_reason: FinPay utilizes X12 transactions and APIs, aligning with healthcare data exchange needs.
